This works beautifully! Thank you.

For those of you that are asking how to use this, extract the file then copy both "TSLHost.dll" and "TS3EP03" and paste them in the game's bin folder. The path should be something like "C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3 Late Night\Game\Bin". Overwrite the existing two files when it asks if you want to.
